data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Chandpur, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chandpur, Chittagong, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Chandpur, Chittagong, Bangladesh. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 3,027 believers in the county of Chandpur.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Chandpur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Akhandji people.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Chandpur.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Chandpur with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Chandpur to agree with you and with one another.

location.name: Chandpur
location.people_groups_list: Patwa (Muslim traditions), Gain, Sardar (Hindu traditions), Tamboli (Muslim traditions), Tanti (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Patwa (Muslim traditions) (8,000), Gain (6,600), Sardar (Hindu traditions) (700), Tamboli (Muslim traditions) (96,000), Tanti (Muslim traditions) (500)
